com.skratchdot.riff.wav.util
Class WavRandomAccessFile

java.lang.Object
  com.skratchdot.riff.wav.util.WavRandomAccessFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.DataInput, java.io.DataOutput
public final class WavRandomAccessFile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.DataInput, java.io.DataOutput

A RandomAccessFile wrapper that converts data to Little Endian format.

public java.io.RandomAccessFile getRandomAccessFile()
                                             throws java.io.IOException
Returns:
Returns the RandomAccessFile that this class wraps
Throws:
java.io.IOException

blockAlign

public void blockAlign()
                throws java.io.IOException
If the filepointer is currently at an odd position, it will advance to an even position.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

writeBlockAlign

public void writeBlockAlign()
                     throws java.io.IOException
If the filepointer is currently at an odd position, it will advance to an even position by writing a byte with value 0x00.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
Throws:
java.io.IOException
